name: post-companies-companyId-terminalOrders
description:
Creates an order for payment terminal products for the company identified in the path.

To make this request, your API credential must have the following [role](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/api-credentials#api-permissions):
* Management APIâ€”Terminal ordering read and write
>Requests to the Management API test endpoint do not create actual orders for test terminals. To order test terminals, you need to [submit a sales order](https://docs.adyen.com/point-of-sale/managing-terminals/order-terminals/#sales-order-steps) in your Customer Area.

companyId.description: The unique identifier of the company account.

billingEntityId.description: The identification of the billing entity to use for the order.

items.description: The products included in the order.

shippingLocationId.description: The identification of the shipping location to use for the order.

taxId.description: The tax number of the billing entity.

id.description: The unique identifier of the product.

installments.description: The number of installments for the specified product `id`.

quantity.description: The number of items with the specified product `id` included in the order.
